name: metric_type
description: Type of metric (cpu, memory, disk, network, etc.)

name: metric_name
description: Name of the specific metric being measured

name: tenant_id
description: Tenant ID if metric is tenant-specific, null for system-wide metrics

name: instance_id
description: Instance or pod identifier where metric was collected

name: service_name
description: Service or component name (api, database, cache, etc.)

name: metric_unit
description: Unit of measurement (%, MB, ms, requests/sec, etc.)

name: labels
description: JSON string of additional metric labels and tags

name: min_value
description: Minimum value in the aggregation period

name: max_value
description: Maximum value in the aggregation period

name: avg_value
description: Average value in the aggregation period

name: sample_count
description: Number of samples in the aggregation period
